img_above_text:
![Wukong Longevity 28.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/3e/Wukong_Longevity_28.jpg)
Head back to the Lower Pagoda Shrine, and revisit the Pagoda Realm Prisoner (aka, the Third Prince of Flowing Sands). He will be grateful for your work in putting his captains to rest, and will award you the **Chubai Spearhead** , which allows you to craft a spear variant of your trusty staff: the Chu-Bai Spear!
img_below_text:
With the Valley of Ecstasy officially cleared of threats, you can now begin to explore the final region of **New Thunderclap Temple**.
Valley of Ecstasy Complete
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Longevity 28.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/3e/Wukong_Longevity_28.jpg)
Head back to the Lower Pagoda Shrine, and revisit the Pagoda Realm Prisoner (aka, the Third Prince of Flowing Sands). He will be grateful for your work in putting his captains to rest, and will award you the **Chubai Spearhead** , which allows you to craft a spear variant of your trusty staff: the Chu-Bai Spear!"
        - Following Text: "With the Valley of Ecstasy officially cleared of threats, you can now begin to explore the final region of **New Thunderclap Temple**.
Valley of Ecstasy Complete"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a snowy, serene courtyard with a pagoda-style shrine in the background, likely representing the **Lower Pagoda Shrine** mentioned in the preceding text. A silhouetted character, presumably the player-controlled protagonist, stands in the foreground holding a staff. This scene appears to follow the completion of a task involving the Pagoda Realm Prisoner and acquiring the **Chubai Spearhead**, and serves as a transition point before exploring the **New Thunderclap Temple** region.
